alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 20 at 10:12PM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and dangerous travel possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Lake IN, Porter, Newton, Jasper, and Benton Counties. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Falling or blowing snow may result in white out conditions with zero visibility at times, making travel extremely difficult, if not impossible. Power outages will also be possible as a result of strong wind gusts 45 to 55 mph. Roads may become ice covered as temperatures rapidly fall Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerously cold wind chills as low as 25 to 35 below zero are likely Thursday night through Friday night. Wind chills of this magnitude can cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 20 minutes.
info.instruction: Prepare for dangerous travel and possible blizzard conditions along with extreme cold. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
